content: That's why I'm particularly fond of <style=Highlight>dresses</style>. My favorite dress was a surprise birthday gift from my teachers at the Academia.

content: {A喜欢}They said they had the fabric made to order from a distant planet to match the color of my tails. Therefore, the beauty of this outfit is truly one of a kind.

content: The teachers at Academia always said that no matter how busy life gets, we must stay clear-minded and elegant. {A小害羞}This has had an influence on my taste in clothes too, yeep~
